been your home: helped you escape the dullness of the world

it turned on you: the satellite blinked in the sky
been your home: so severely erased your sense of self

it turned on you: the fish fell from the sky

been your home: informed your sense of self and being

it turned on you: the trees became covered in dead pixels
the mayor was replaced by this organization
been your home: never fully revealed itself to you

it turned on you: access to data became a human right

been your home: shielded your loved ones from harm

it turned on you: western influences faded into the ether of time
it successfully managed to tokenize its “outsiders”
hid its biases in luxurious institutions
all the data streams became visible
